page.title: 07My Summer Holidays
page.content: I normally spend my Summer Holidays going a day here and there. Occasionally we go away for a week or two.If we stay at home we go to the Beach on a hot day.We take a picnic and Itake my swimming costume. If it is not a hot day we might go to Kinross Market or to Aberdeen.On some days we just stay at home and sun bathe.On these days I sometimes go to the Park at the Inch. There is a Paddling Pool and Swings.If I have money I like to go on the Trampolines. Sometimes we go to visit my Auntie in St Andrews.My dad is a keen gardener so we sometimes go to Duthie Park Gardens in Aberdeen. On a Summer's Night we occasionally go to my Auntie's at Trinity Fields for a Barbecue.I really enjoy the Summer Holidays.
